mapper.select: SELECT feature.`feature_name` FROM happysys_product product INNER JOIN happysys_feature_list flist ON product.product_feature = flist.`feature_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_feature_center fcenter ON fcenter.`feature_list_id` = flist.`feature_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_feature feature ON feature.`feature_id` = fcenter.`feature_id` WHERE product_id = #{productId}
